sublabel.en: Choose a name for your loan that describes it in about five words, e.g. Improving Waste Management in Tanzania
sublabel.fr: Choose a name for your loan that describes it in about five words, e.g. Improving Waste Management in Tanzania

sublabel.en: Enter the first four letters of the name of the borrower, e.g. TANW
sublabel.fr: Enter the first four letters of the name of the borrower, e.g. TANW

sublabel.en: Describe the loan in one sentence, e.g. Helping the residents of Tanzania overcome the public health challenges of waste management by providing quality and sustainable waste services.
sublabel.fr: Describe the loan in one sentence, e.g. Helping the residents of Tanzania overcome the public health challenges of waste management by providing quality and sustainable waste services.

sublabel.en: Choose a short descriptor to be used in the URL for your loan, e.g. tanwaste-2022. (No spaces or special characters.)
sublabel.fr: Choose a short descriptor to be used in the URL for your loan, e.g. tanwaste-2022. (No spaces or special characters.)

label.en: BSB (for transfers from Australian bank accounts)
label.fr: BSB (for transfers from Australian bank accounts)

label.en: Account number (for transfers from Australian bank accounts)
label.fr: Account number (for transfers from Australian bank accounts)

label.en: ACH routing number (for US to US transfers)
label.fr: ACH routing number (for US to US transfers)

label.en: Wire routing number (for US to US transfers)
label.fr: Wire routing number (for US to US transfers)

label.en: Loan agreement already signed by borrower
label.fr: Loan agreement already signed by borrower

label.en: Link to a video pitch for this loan (Vimeo or YouTube links preferred)
label.fr: Link to a video pitch for this loan (Vimeo or YouTube links preferred)

label.en: Loan amount (in Australian or US dollars)
label.fr: Loan amount (in Australian or US dollars)

label.en: Loan period (in months, must be full months)
label.fr: Loan period (in months, must be full months)

label.en: Is this loan being proposed by an impact intermediary on behalf of a borrower?
label.fr: Is this loan being proposed by an impact intermediary on behalf of a borrower?

label.en: Provide a short description of the intermediary's business and experience working with impact enterprises (2000 character limit)
label.fr: Provide a short description of the intermediary's business and experience working with impact enterprises (2000 character limit)

label.en: Provide a short description of the intermediary's history with the borrower (2000 character limit)
label.fr: Provide a short description of the intermediary's history with the borrower (2000 character limit)

label.en: Upload an image that will display in the background of your loan information (max 10mb, banner image)
label.fr: Upload an image that will display in the background of your loan information (max 10mb, banner image)

label.en: Upload an image that will display on the website (max 10mb, 16x9 ratio)
label.fr: Upload an image that will display on the website (max 10mb, 16x9 ratio)

label.en: Upload an image that will display as the cover on the loan page (max 10mb, displays square)
label.fr: Upload an image that will display as the cover on the loan page (max 10mb, displays square)

label.en: Provide a short summary on the background and context of the loan, and how this fits with the mission of the borrower (2000 character limit)
label.fr: Provide a short summary on the background and context of the loan, and how this fits with the mission of the borrower (2000 character limit)

label.en: Provide a 50-75 word description of the loan that describes what the money will be used for, how it will benefit the world, and how it will benefit the enterprise
label.fr: Provide a 50-75 word description of the loan that describes what the money will be used for, how it will benefit the world, and how it will benefit the enterprise

label.en: Provide brief insights and information on how the borrower has been pursuing its impact mission to date, and its long term impact and commercial ambitions (2000 character limit)
label.fr: Provide brief insights and information on how the borrower has been pursuing its impact mission to date, and its long term impact and commercial ambitions (2000 character limit)

label.en: Contact email for questions from lenders
label.fr: Contact email for questions from lenders

sublabel.en: Please select "no". Featured loans will be set by the platform administrator.
sublabel.fr: Please select "no". Featured loans will be set by the platform administrator.

label.en: Describe the positive social and/or environmental impact the loan will create, and how it will be measured/assessed (2000 character limit)
label.fr: Describe the positive social and/or environmental impact the loan will create, and how it will be measured/assessed (2000 character limit)

label.en: Describe the impact the borrower has created so far (2000 character limit)
label.fr: Describe the impact the borrower has created so far (2000 character limit)

label.en: Please share any links to information online that demonstrates the impact story of the borrower (2000 character limit)
label.fr: Please share any links to information online that demonstrates the impact story of the borrower (2000 character limit)

label.en: Impact documents - upload documents in support of your loan request (each document < 10mb), including testimonials, case studies, reports
label.fr: Impact documents - upload documents in support of your loan request (each document < 10mb), including testimonials, case studies, reports

label.en: What Sustainable Development Goals does the loan help to achieve?
label.fr: What Sustainable Development Goals does the loan help to achieve?

label.en: Provide information on why the loan is needed by the borrower, and detail how the loan funds will be used (2000 character limit)
label.fr: Provide information on why the loan is needed by the borrower, and detail how the loan funds will be used (2000 character limit)

label.en: If any other funding has been secured or promised towards this loan or related activities, please provide details (2000 character limit)
label.fr: If any other funding has been secured or promised towards this loan or related activities, please provide details (2000 character limit)

label.en: Describe what commercial benefits the loan will provide to the borrower over the term of the loan and beyond (2000 character limit)
label.fr: Describe what commercial benefits the loan will provide to the borrower over the term of the loan and beyond (2000 character limit)

label.en: If the borrower is offering any securities or guarantees on this loan, please provide detail here (2000 character limit)
label.fr: If the borrower is offering any securities or guarantees on this loan, please provide detail here (2000 character limit)

label.en: Provide information on the viability of the loan and how the borrower will be able to pay the loan back by the end of the loan term (2000 character limit)
label.fr: Provide information on the viability of the loan and how the borrower will be able to pay the loan back by the end of the loan term (2000 character limit)

label.en: Commercial impact and viability documents - upload documents in support of your loan request (each document < 10mb), including references, cash flow projections, financial history
label.fr: Commercial impact and viability documents - upload documents in support of your loan request (each document < 10mb), including references, cash flow projections, financial history

label.en: Minimum loan amount (if fixed amount, set minimum and maximum as the same)
label.fr: Minimum loan amount (if fixed amount, set minimum and maximum as the same)

label.en: Maximum loan amount (if fixed amount, set minimum and maximum as the same)
label.fr: Maximum loan amount (if fixed amount, set minimum and maximum as the same)

sublabel.fr: Lenders may not subscribe after this time

label.fr: Loan maturity date (needs to align with proposed loan period in months, from date of issue)

sublabel.en: Each loan is divided into units of a nominal value. Please set to 1 unless otherwise instructed.
